title: dhyAna pUjai seivOm
sahitya:
dhyAna pUjai seivOm dhyAna pUjai sheivOm


caraNam 1    shiva nAda shankhai Udi shivanai vazhipaDuvOm tAvum aruvip-pATTuDanE sAmagAman sheivOm
    caraNam 2    urugik-karaiyum uL viLakkai uyarat-tUNDuvOm karuvi kAraNam tOya deivak-kAdal kUruvOm
    caraNam 3    vAnulagam kOyil enbAm vAzhuyirE kaDavuL kANiyark-kai azhagu deivak-kATSi ennuvOmE
    caraNam 4    mazhaiyum paniyum manjanamAgum malargaL aNiyAmE kuzhaiyum manamE candanamAgum guNangaL manangaLAm
 caraNam 5    ovvOr uyirppum aruccanaiyAgum uLLat-tuDippellAm divviya naTanamAgum iduvE dhyAna pUjaiyAmE
